code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{selectCount,setSelectedComic}from"../../features/comic/comicSlice";import{Container}from"./styles";import useHome from"./hooks";import Grid from"@material-ui/core/Grid";import{ComicCard}from"../../components";import{ListItemIcon}from"@material-ui/core";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Login=function Login(){var comic=useSelector(selectCount);var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useHome=useHome(),getComics=_useHome.getComics,loading=_useHome.loading,marvelComics=_useHome.marvelComics;useEffect(function(){if(comic.length===0){getComics();}console.log("comig: ",comic);},[]);function _setComic(item){dispatch(setSelectedComic(item));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#fff"},children:"home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"carregando comics"}),!loading&&comic!==[]&&comic.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ComicCard,{title:item.title,uri:item.thumbnail.path+"/portrait_fantastic.jpg",setComic:function setComic(){return _setComic(item);}})});})]})]});};export default Login;
